Articles.Content: How about banning swear words and automatically muting any People that try to say them?
Isn't that the case already? And in anycase is this even an issue on the forums? I don't think I've ever seen an actual swear word that wasn't bleeped.

(sal_vager bans the phrase "swear words" and mutes MedwedianPresident)

The is a filter, people who kinda sorta maybe self censor just enough so you still know what they are saying are covered by community rule 2.2G
